name: styled-cli-table
description: Terminal table rendering library with cascading styles and open to extend architecture

scripts.build:commonjs: npm run clean:commonjs && tsc --project config/tsconfig.commonjs.json && copyfiles -u 1 "lib/**/*.d.ts" commonjs && copyfiles -u 1 config/package.commonjs.json commonjs && node scripts/rename.js commonjs/package.commonjs.json commonjs/package.json
scripts.build:module: npm run clean:module && tsc --project config/tsconfig.module.json && copyfiles -u 1 "lib/**/*.d.ts" module
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:module
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=config/tsconfig.test.json node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --harmony-optional-chaining --harmony-nullish --require ts-node/register node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --extension ts

author: evg656e <evg656e@gmail.com>
